subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Ed Carpenter posted the fastest time early in Saturday’s qualifying, and then did it again late in the afternoon to take the top seed into Sunday’s Indianapolis 500 pole shootout.
snippet: Ed Carpenter posted the fastest time early in Saturday’s qualifying, and then did it again late in the afternoon to take the top seed into Sunday’s Indianapolis 500 pole shootout.
